T.38 support :: UDPTL

Asterisk supports T.38 fax passthrough, origination and termination. It does not support gateway operation. The only channel driver that supports T.38 at this time is chan_sip.

UDPTL is handled very much like RTP. It can be reinvited to go directly between the endpoints, without involving Asterisk in the media stream.

References:

  • chan_sip.c
  • udptl.c
  • app_fax.c
